com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui

Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccountAuthenticatorActivity
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.LoginActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAuthWebviewHelper.OAuthWebviewHelperEvents

    public class LoginActivity
extends AccountAuthenticatorActivity
implements OAuthWebviewHelper.OAuthWebviewHelperEvents
    Login Activity: takes care of authenticating the user. Authorization happens inside a web view. Once we get our authorization code, we swap it for an access and refresh token a create an account through the account manager to store them. The bulk of the work for this is actually managed by OAuthWebviewHelper class.
